name: Chocolate Liqueur
description: A creamy easy and so delicious Chocolate Liqueur Recipe. A perfect after dinner dessert Drink.

ingredients.ingredient: cups brandy or spirit of choice

directions: Blend dry ingredients together in a bowl.
Add dry ingredient mixture, stirring to avoid clumping.
Let boil for a minute, then remove from heat and let cool completely.
Once cooled, add to a lidded container with 2 cups of brandy, seal then shake to combine.
Make the syrup the same as above.
When it comes to blending, add 14oz sweetened condensed milk to a blender with 1 1/4 cup brandy.
Add 1 cup cream, and 1 cup of the syrup. Blend again till just combined.
Transfer to a lidded container, and keep in the fridge for up to two months.
Separation is normal! Simply give this a good shake before pouring. Cheers!
